article.title: NA62 Charged Particle Hodoscope. Design and performance in 2016 run

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the primary goal of the NA62 experiment?
choices: To measure the branching ratio of the ultra-rare decay K+ → π⁺νῦ with 1% accuracy.
To measure the branching ratio of the ultra-rare decay K+ → π⁺νῦ with 10% accuracy.
To measure the branching ratio of the ultra-rare decay K+ → π⁺νν with 1% accuracy.
To measure the branching ratio of the ultra-rare decay K+ → π⁺νν with 10% accuracy.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the approximate overall average efficiency for the fiducial sensitive area of the CHOD detector?
What type of scintillator is used in the construction of the CHOD detector tiles?
What is the approximate time resolution (σ) achieved by the CHOD detector with the use of classical threshold discriminators?
